Highlights in Jazz #14: Odetta, David Amram, Pepper Adams, Jerry Dodgion, Herb Bushler, Al Harewood (Tape 3 of 3)
Highlights in Jazz #14: Odetta, David Amram, Pepper Adams, Jerry Dodgion, Herb Bushler, Al Harewood (Tape 3 of 3)
Tape labeled Tape 3 of 3. This is the only recording that the University Archives has of this event.

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "Content plays generally well throughout, however the glare from Odetta's guitar triggers an autoexposure response from the TBC that repeatedly dims the image. Her performance here (as well as on another tape) were captured using multiple TBCs, and this file represents the most satisfactory transfer, despite the luma error. Elsewhere, there are occasional dropouts and tape wear, along with recurring image jitter. Persistent edge wear throughout, as well as visible head switching."
